**Last Updated: October 22, 2025**

 Welcome to the LuxeVista Resort mobile application (the "App"). This App is provided to assist customers in gathering resort information, determining the availability of goods and services, making legitimate reservations, or otherwise transacting business with us. The terms "we", "us", "our", and "LuxeVista Resort" refer to the owners of the LuxeVista Resort. The term "you" refers to the customer visiting the App and/or booking a reservation through us on this App.

 By using this App, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms"). Please read them carefully.

 **1. Use of the Application**
 As a condition of your use of this App, you warrant that:
 • You are at least 18 years of age.
 • You possess the legal authority to create a binding legal obligation.
 • You will use this App in accordance with these Terms.
 • You will only use this App to make legitimate reservations for you or for another person for whom you are legally authorized to act.
 • All information supplied by you on this App is true, accurate, current, and complete.

 **2. User Accounts**
 To access certain features of the App, you must register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account information. You are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to immediately notify LuxeVista Resort of any unauthorized use of your account.

 **3. Booking and Financial Terms**
 • **Reservations**: All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. A reservation is not confirmed until you receive a confirmation number and a confirmation email/in-app notification.
 • **Payment**: You agree to provide valid payment information at the time of booking. By providing your payment information, you authorize us to charge the applicable fees for your reservation. All prices are displayed in USD and are subject to change.
 • **Cancellations and Refunds**:
 		- **Rooms**: Cancellations made more than 7 days prior to the check-in date will receive a full refund. Cancellations made within 7 days of the check-in date are non-refundable.
 		- **Services (Spa, Dining, etc.)**: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance to receive a full refund. Cancellations made within 24 hours of the appointment are non-refundable.
 		- No-shows will be charged the full amount of the reservation.

 **4. Prohibited Activities**
 The content and information on this App, as well as the infrastructure used to provide such content, is proprietary to us. You agree not to:
 • Use this App or its contents for any commercial purpose.
 • Make any speculative, false, or fraudulent reservation.
 • Access, monitor, or copy any content or information of this App using any robot, spider, scraper, or other automated means.
 • "Frame", "mirror", or otherwise incorporate any part of this App into any other website or application without our prior written authorization.

 **5. Limitation of Liability**
 LuxeVista Resort will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with the use of this App or with the delay or inability to use this App, or for any information, products, and services obtained through this App.

 **6. Changes to Terms**
 We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the App after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

 **7. Governing Law**
 These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Sri Lanka.

 **8. Contact Us**
 If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
 LuxeVista Resort, Dehiwala-Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka
 Email: contact@luxevista.com

**Last Updated: October 22, 2025**

 This Privacy Policy describes how LuxeVista Resort ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your information in connection with your use of our mobile application (the "App"). Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) of Sri Lanka and other applicable laws.

 **1. Information We Collect**
 We collect information you provide directly to us when you use our App. This includes:
 • **Account Information**: When you create an account, we collect your first and last name, email address, phone number, physical address, and password.
 • **Booking Information**: When you book a room or reserve a service, we collect details about that transaction, including the type of room/service, dates, and any special requests.
 • **Payment Information**: To process bookings, we collect payment card information. This information is used solely for payment processing for your reservation.

 **2. How We Use Your Information**
 We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
 • **To Provide and Manage Services**: To create and manage your account, process your bookings, and provide you with the services you request.
 • **To Communicate with You**: To send you booking confirmations, reminders, and other administrative messages.
 • **To Improve Our Services**: To understand how our users interact with the App so we can improve the user experience.
 • **For Security**: To protect against fraud, unauthorized transactions, and other liabilities.

 **3. Data Storage and Security**
 • **Local Storage**: All your personal data, including your profile and booking history, is stored locally on your device in a secure SQLite database. This means your data is not transmitted to or stored on our central servers, enhancing your privacy.
 • **Security Measures**: We take reasonable measures to help protect your information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access. However, no electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure.

 **4. Sharing of Information**
 We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties for marketing, advertising, or other purposes. Your data is used exclusively for the functioning of the LuxeVista Resort App on your device.

 **5. Your Rights**
 In accordance with the PDPA of Sri Lanka, you have the right to:
 • **Access Your Data**: You can view your personal and booking information at any time within the App's profile and booking sections.
 • **Correct Your Data**: You can update your profile information within the App.
 • **Delete Your Data**: Deleting the application from your device will remove the locally stored database containing your personal information.

 **6. Changes to This Policy**
 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the "Last Updated" date at the top of the policy and, in some cases, we may provide you with additional notice (such as adding a statement to our homepage or sending you a notification).

 **7. Contact Us**
 If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
 LuxeVista Resort, Dehiwala-Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka
 Email: privacy@luxevista.com
